about_the_game:
Welcome to the Rainbow Run FREE Expansion Pack!

The Rainbow Run Expansion breathes new life into Rainbow Run's base game. It provides players with access to an extra 10 levels, all scaling in difficulty, for players to complete. However, there's a twist! Instead of the difficult rage-inducing take on the base game of Rainbow Run, the expansion aims to please all players. Some of the new levels are based on rage-inducing mechanics, while other levels may feature puzzles that require critical thinking to solve. This is possible through the introduction of 4 new cubes that were never-before-seen in the base game!

- Physics Block: Cubes that can be picked up and moved by the player.
- Gravity Block: Touching the cube gives the player instant zero-gravity!
- Fade Block: Reveals other hidden cubes around the level.
- Swap Block: Cubes that switch between two any other types of cubes every certain amount of seconds.

The Expansion aims to provide players with lots of extra content and IT'S FREE!

Specific Features:
- 10 brand new levels that all scale in difficulty
- 4 brand new cubes with different effects!
- Fade Block: Reveals other hidden cubes around the level.
- Swap Block: Cubes that switch between two any other cubes every certain amount of seconds.
- Physics Block: Cubes that can be picked up and moved by the player.
- Gravity Block: Touching the cube gives the player instant zero-gravity!
- New soundtracks

name: Rainbow Run - Free Expansion Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-Bit versions only)
  • Processor: 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 480 or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A new twist on Rainbow Run: the introduction of new blocks and levels provide players with challenges that they may need to use their mind and parkour skills to solve - AND IT'S FREE!
